## Registerer.register() method

Sends the REGISTER request.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
register(options?: RegistererRegisterOptions): Promise<OutgoingRegisterRequest>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | <code>RegistererRegisterOptions</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<OutgoingRegisterRequest>`

## Remarks

If successful, sends re-REGISTER requests prior to registration expiration until `unsubscribe()` is called. Rejects with `RequestPendingError` if a REGISTER request is already in progress.
